name: Communis
description: Communis is an incentive token for long term HEX stakers Welcome to the perpetual Adoption Amplifier for HEX COM will act as an ultimate automatic marketing network for existing and new HEX users. Communis is a token on the Pulsechain & Ethereum networks that is distributed to HEX Stakers as an incentive to stake longer. Anyone who has shares from an active stake from 180 days to 5555 days can mint their own free $COM.
